document.masterDocTitle: Three new Indasclera species from Laos including new data on distribution and list of species (Coleoptera: Oedemeridae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new Indasclera species from Laos including new data on distribution and list of species (Coleoptera: Oedemeridae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species.
Asclera indica Fairmaire, 1894
, by original designation.

Indasclera brunneipennis ( Lewis, 1895 )
Japan : Hokkaido , Honshu, Kyushu, Shikoku

Indasclera carinicollis ( Lewis, 1895 )
Japan : Hokkaido , Honshu; Russia : Kuril Islands
(Kunashir)

Japan : Honshu, Kyushu, Shikoku

Indasclera nakanei Mizota, 1999
Japan : Honshu, Kyushu

Indasclera ruficollis ( Lewis, 1895 )
Japan : Honshu, Kyushu, Shikoku
